item.title: Algo Trading: The Optimal Execution Problem
item.description: Introduction Algorithmic trading is omnipresent in the financial industry, where a form of automated trading executes the orders and decides the amount of shares, the entry point and/or the exit point. In the present blog post, we define and explore the problem of optimal execution in the context of algorithmic trading. Optimal Execution Let's imagine that you need to sell a large amount of shares $S_t$ at a certain time $t$ with $P_t$.
